name: Rage of Bahamut
description:
Rage of Bahamut is a game developed by Cygames. It came out on 01-01-2012. It was published by Mobage. Most rawgers rated the game as "Meh".
Rage of Bahamut is available on iOS and Android.
Kohei Otsuka, Norihiro Furukawa, Rei Ishizuka and Takatsugu Wakabayashi scored the game.
